quote: I used to think I had all the time in the world to do everything I wanted. But what's the use of having all the time in the world if you're always wasting it on things that don't mean a thing?
quote_letters: I USED TO THINK I HAD ALL THE TIME IN THE WORLD TO DO EVERYTHING I WANTED BUT WHATS THE USE OF HAVING ALL THE TIME IN THE WORLD IF YOURE ALWAYS WASTING IT ON THINGS THAT DONT MEAN A THING
